dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Back in 2024, the National Security Committee just announced a major bust in the Akmola region.

dialogue_turns.text: Oh wow, what kind of bust are we talking about?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh wow, what kind of bust are we talking about?

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: They blocked this huge illegal trafficking channel for explosives—specifically, uh, ammonium nitrate.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Employees of the National Security Committee (NSC), in coordination with the Prosecutor's Office, have blocked a channel of illegal trafficking of explosive materials in the Akmola region.

dialogue_turns.text: Ammonium nitrate? That's the stuff used in mining, right? And sometimes, unfortunately, improvised explosives.

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to reports, during the operation, 200 kilograms of ammonium nitrate (equivalent to 60 kilograms of TNT) were discovered and seized, along with 200 units of detonating cords with blasting caps.
